Fortunately, both SLES 15 and RHEL 8 changed the behavior of FCP to automatic logical unit number (LUN) detection. Therefore, it is sufficient to merely configure the host adapters and use the multipathed device only for disk configurations. This section assumes that no previous zFCP was available. The planning according to this manual creates two FCP adapters at the addresses 0.0.fc00 and 0.0.fd00.
